title: Our brains are made of Neurons
image: A diagram illustrating the basic structure of a neuron and its connections. Key parts like the cell body, axon, dendrites, synapse, and presynaptic terminal are clearly labeled. The diagram shows one central neuron connecting to the dendrites and presynaptic terminals of other neurons, demonstrating how neurons form interconnected networks.
summary: This slide introduces the fundamental building block of the brain, the neuron, as indicated by the title 'Our brains are made of Neurons'. It features a detailed diagram of a neuron, explicitly labeling its core components: the cell body, axon, dendrites, synapse, and presynaptic terminal, to visually explain the structure and interconnection of neurons within the brain.
